revised_title: Pu Fission Track Thermometry and Its Application to Stony Meteorites
tldr: This article presents a study on the cooling rates of stony meteorites using 244Pu fission track thermometry. The research focuses on the H chondrites and their parent asteroids, providing insights into the early thermal environments of meteorites and their parent bodies. The study also discusses the principle of the multiple-detector method used to analyze the fission track densities in meteorites.
